es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api.charts

Interface IAmXyChartController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAmchartController<AmChart>, IAmCoordinateChartController<AmCoordinateChart>, IAmRectangularChartController<AmRectangularChart>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmXyChartController

    public interface IAmXyChartController
extends IAmRectangularChartController<AmRectangularChart>
    Interface for controller of AmXyChart. Details of AmXyChart and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
